description.purefps.hack.aimassist: Helps you aim at nearby entities.
description.purefps.hack.airplace: Allows you to place blocks in mid-air.
description.purefps.hack.anchoraura: Automatically places (optional), charges, and detonates respawn anchors to kill entities around you.
description.purefps.hack.antiafk:
Walks around randomly to hide you from AFK detectors.
Needs at least 3x3 blocks of free space.
description.purefps.hack.antiblind:
Prevents blindness and darkness effects.
Incompatible with OptiFine.
description.purefps.hack.antientitypush: Prevents you from getting pushed by players and mobs.
description.purefps.hack.antihunger: Slows down your hunger when you are walking.
description.purefps.hack.antiknockback: Prevents you from taking knockback from players and mobs.
description.purefps.hack.antispam: Blocks chat spam by adding a counter to repeated messages.
description.purefps.hack.antiwaterpush: Prevents you from getting pushed by water.
description.purefps.hack.antiwobble: Disables the wobble effect caused by nausea and portals.
description.purefps.hack.arrowdmg:
Massively increases arrow damage, but also consumes a lot of hunger and reduces accuracy.

Does not work with crossbows and seems to be patched on Paper servers.
description.purefps.setting.arrowdmg.pac:
Amount of packets to send.
More packets = higher damage.
description.purefps.setting.arrowdmg.tri:
When enabled, tridents fly much further. Doesn't seem to affect damage or Riptide.

§c§lWARNING:§r You can easily lose your trident by enabling this option!
description.purefps.hack.autobuild:
Builds things automatically.
Place a single block to start building.
description.purefps.hack.autocomplete: Auto-completes your chat messages using large language models. Requires either an OpenAI account with API access or a locally installed language model with the oobabooga web UI.
description.purefps.hack.autoleave: Automatically leaves the server when your health is low.
description.purefps.hack.autolibrarian: Automatically trains a villager to become a librarian that sells a specific enchanted book. You can set up an entire trading hall in no time by using this hack.
description.purefps.setting.autoeat.targ: Tries to keep the hunger bar at or above this level, but only if it doesn't waste any hunger points.
description.purefps.setting.autoeat.min_:
Always keeps the hunger bar at or above this level, even if it wastes some hunger points.
6.5 - Cannot cause any waste with vanilla food items.
10.0 - Completely ignores waste and just keeps the hunger bar full.
description.purefps.setting.autoeat.inju:
Fills the hunger bar to at least this level when you are injured, even if it wastes some hunger points.
10.0 - fastest healing
9.0 - slowest healing
<9.0 - no healing
<3.5 - no sprinting
Prevents small injuries from wasting all your food. AutoEat will only consider you injured if you have lost at least this number of hearts.
description.purefps.setting.autoeat.take: Where AutoEat should look for food.
description.purefps.setting.autoeat.allo:
Rotten flesh applies a harmless "hunger" effect.
It is safe to eat and useful as emergency food.

Poisonous food applies damage over time.
Not recommended.

Eating chorus fruit teleports you to a random location.
Not recommended.
description.purefps.hack.autofarm:
Harvests and replants crops automatically.
Works with wheat, carrots, potatoes, beetroots, pumpkins, melons, cacti, sugar canes, kelp, bamboo, nether warts, and cocoa beans.
description.purefps.hack.autofish: Automatically catches fish using your best fishing rod. If it finds a better rod while fishing, it will automatically switch to it.
description.purefps.hack.automine: Automatically mines any block that you look at.
description.purefps.hack.autopotion: Automatically throws splash potions of instant health when your health is low.
description.purefps.hack.autoreconnect: Automatically reconnects when you get kicked from the server.
description.purefps.hack.autorespawn: Automatically respawns you whenever you die.
description.purefps.hack.autosign: Instantly writes whatever text you want on every sign you place or edit. Once activated, you can write normally on the first sign to specify the text for all other signs.
description.purefps.hack.autosoup:
Automatically eats soup when your health is low.

§lNote:§r This hack ignores hunger and assumes that eating soup directly refills your health. If the server you are playing on is not configured to do that, use AutoEat instead.
description.purefps.hack.autosteal: Automatically steals everything from all chests and shulker boxes that you open.
description.purefps.hack.autoswitch:
Switches the item in your hand all the time.

§lProTip:§r Use this in combination with BuildRandom while having a lot of different colored wool or concrete blocks in your hotbar.
description.purefps.hack.autosword:
Automatically uses the best weapon in your hotbar to attack entities.
Tip: This works with Killaura.
description.purefps.hack.autotool: Automatically equips the fastest applicable tool in your hotbar when you try to break a block.
description.purefps.hack.autototem: Automatically moves totems of undying to your off-hand.
description.purefps.hack.basefinder:
Finds player bases by searching for man-made blocks.
The blocks that it finds will be highlighted in the selected color.
Good for finding faction bases.
description.purefps.hack.blink: Suspends all motion updates while enabled.
description.purefps.hack.boatfly:
Allows you to fly with boats and other vehicles.
Press the sprint key to go down faster.
description.purefps.hack.bonemealaura:
Automatically uses bone meal on specific types of plants.
Use the checkboxes to specify the types of plants.
description.purefps.hack.bowaimbot: Automatically aims your bow or crossbow.
description.purefps.hack.cameradistance: Allows you to change the camera distance in 3rd person.
description.purefps.hack.cameranoclip: Allows the camera in 3rd person to go through walls.
description.purefps.hack.cavefinder: Helps you to find caves by highlighting them in the selected color.
description.purefps.hack.chattranslator: Translates incoming chat messages using Google Translate.
description.purefps.hack.clickaura:
Automatically attacks the closest valid entity whenever you click.

§c§lWARNING:§r ClickAuras generally look more suspicious than Killauras and are easier for plugins to detect. It is recommended to use Killaura or TriggerBot instead.
description.purefps.hack.crashchest:
Generates a chest that essentially bans people from the server if they have too many copies of it in their inventory. §c§lWARNING:§r §cThis cannot be undone. Use with caution!§r

If copies are instead placed in a chest, anyone who opens the chest will be kicked from the server (just once).
description.purefps.hack.creativeflight:
Allows you to fly like in Creative Mode.

§c§lWARNING:§r You will take fall damage if you don't use NoFall.
description.purefps.hack.criticals: Changes all your hits to critical hits.
description.purefps.hack.crystalaura: Automatically places (optional) and detonates end crystals to kill entities around you.
description.purefps.hack.derp:
Randomly moves your head around.
Only visible to other players.
description.purefps.hack.dolphin:
Makes you bob up in water automatically.
(just like a dolphin)
description.purefps.hack.excavator: Automatically breaks all blocks in the selected area.
description.purefps.hack.extraelytra: Makes the Elytra easier to use.
description.purefps.hack.fancychat:
Replaces ASCII characters in sent chat messages with fancier unicode characters. Can be used to bypass curse word filters on some servers.
Does not work on servers that block unicode characters.
description.purefps.hack.fastbreak:
Allows you to break blocks faster.
Tip: This works with Nuker.
description.purefps.hack.fastladder: Allows you to climb up ladders faster.
description.purefps.hack.fastplace:
Allows you to place blocks 5 times faster.
Tip: This can speed up other hacks like AutoBuild.
description.purefps.hack.fightbot:
A bot that automatically walks around and kills everything.
Good for MobArena.
description.purefps.hack.fish: Disables underwater gravity so you can swim like a fish.
description.purefps.hack.flight:
Allows you to fly.

§c§lWARNING:§r You will take fall damage if you don't use NoFall.
description.purefps.hack.follow:
A bot that follows the closest entity.
Very annoying.

Use .follow to follow a specific entity.
description.purefps.hack.forceop:
Cracks AuthMe passwords.
Can be used to get OP.
description.purefps.hack.freecam: Allows you to move the camera without moving your character.
description.purefps.hack.fullbright: Allows you to see in the dark.
description.purefps.hack.glide:
Makes you glide down slowly when falling.

§c§lWARNING:§r You will take fall damage if you don't use NoFall.
description.purefps.hack.handnoclip: Allows you to reach specific blocks through walls.
description.purefps.hack.headroll:
Makes you nod all the time.
Only visible to other players.
description.purefps.hack.healthtags: Shows the health of players in their nametags.
description.purefps.hack.highjump:
Allows you to jump higher.

§c§lWARNING:§r You will take fall damage if you don't use NoFall.
description.purefps.hack.infinichat:
Removes the 256 character limit from the chat.
Useful for long commands that modify NBT data.

§6§lNOTICE:§r Not recommended for talking to people. Most servers will cut messages to 256 characters on their end.
description.purefps.hack.instantbunker: Builds a small bunker around you. Needs 57 blocks.
description.purefps.hack.invwalk: Allows you to move around while the inventory is open.
description.purefps.setting.invwalk.allo: Allows you to move around while Wurst's ClickGUI is open.
Allows you to move around while other in-game screens are open (e.g. chest, horse, villager trading), unless the screen has a text box.
description.purefps.hack.itemgenerator:
Generates random items and drops them on the ground.
§oCreative mode only.§r
description.purefps.hack.jesus:
Allows you to walk on water.
Jesus used this hack ~2000 years ago.
description.purefps.hack.jetpack:
Allows you to fly as if you had a jetpack.

§c§lWARNING:§r You will take fall damage if you don't use NoFall.
description.purefps.hack.kaboom:
Breaks blocks around you like an explosion.
This can be a lot faster than Nuker if the server doesn't have NoCheat+. It works best with fast tools and weak blocks.
Note: This is not an actual explosion.
description.purefps.hack.killauralegit:
Slower Killaura that is harder to detect.
Not required on normal NoCheat+ servers!
description.purefps.hack.killpotion:
Generates a potion that can kill almost anything, including players in Creative mode. Does not work on undead mobs, since they are already dead.

Requires Creative mode.
description.purefps.hack.liquids: Allows you to place blocks in liquids.
description.purefps.hack.masstpa:
Sends a TPA request to all players.
Stops if someone accepts.
description.purefps.hack.mobspawnesp:
Highlights areas where mobs can spawn.
§eyellow§r - mobs can spawn at night
§cred§r - mobs can always spawn
description.purefps.hack.multiaura: Faster Killaura that attacks multiple entities at once.
description.purefps.hack.nametags: Changes the scale of the nametags so you can always read them. Also allows you to see the nametags of sneaking players.
description.purefps.hack.navigator: A searchable GUI that learns your preferences over time.
description.purefps.hack.newchunks: Highlights newly generated chunks around you.
description.purefps.hack.nobackground: Removes the dark background behind inventories.
description.purefps.hack.noclip:
Allows you to freely move through blocks.
A block (e.g. sand) must fall on your head to activate it.

§c§lWARNING:§r You will take damage while moving through blocks!
description.purefps.hack.nocomcrash:
Lags and crashes servers using the Nocom exploit.
Does not work on Paper servers. Tested working on Vanilla, Spigot, and Fabric. Can be disabled by some AntiCheats.
description.purefps.hack.nofireoverlay:
Blocks the overlay when you are on fire.

§c§lWARNING:§r This can cause you to burn to death without noticing.
description.purefps.hack.nohurtcam: Disables the shaking effect when you get hurt.
description.purefps.hack.nolevitation:
Disables the levitation effect when you get hit by a Shulker.

§c§lWARNING:§r You will fall if you activate this while the levitation effect is already active!
description.purefps.hack.nooverlay: Blocks the overlays of water and lava.
description.purefps.hack.nopumpkin: Blocks the overlay when wearing a pumpkin on your head.
description.purefps.hack.noslowdown: Cancels slowness effects caused by honey, soul sand and using items.
description.purefps.hack.noweather: Allows you to alter the client-side weather, time and moon phase.
description.purefps.hack.noweb: Prevents you from getting slowed down by cobwebs.
description.purefps.hack.nukerlegit:
Slower Nuker that bypasses all AntiCheat plugins.
Not required on normal NoCheat+ servers!
description.purefps.hack.openwateresp: Shows whether or not you are fishing in 'open water' and draws a box around the area used for the open water calculation.
description.purefps.hack.overlay: Renders the Nuker animation whenever you mine a block.
description.purefps.hack.panic:
Instantly turns off all enabled hacks.
Be careful with this one!
description.purefps.hack.parkour:
Makes you jump automatically when reaching the edge of a block.
Useful for parkours and jump'n'runs.
description.purefps.hack.playeresp:
Highlights nearby players.
ESP boxes of friends will appear in blue.
description.purefps.hack.portalgui: Allows you to open GUIs in portals.
description.purefps.hack.potionsaver: Freezes all potion effects while you are standing still.
description.purefps.hack.prophuntesp:
Allows you to see fake blocks in Prophunt.
Made for Mineplex Prophunt. Might not work on other servers.
description.purefps.hack.protect:
A bot that follows the closest entity and protects it from other entities.
Use .protect to protect a specific entity instead of the closest one.
description.purefps.hack.radar:
Shows the location of nearby entities.
§cred§r - players
§6orange§r - monsters
§agreen§r - animals
§7gray§r - others
description.purefps.hack.remoteview:
Allows you to see the world as someone else.
Use the .rv command to make it target a specific entity.
description.purefps.hack.restock: Automatically restocks your hand with the selected items from your inventory. Works better with FastPlace.
description.purefps.hack.safewalk: Prevents you from falling off edges.
description.purefps.hack.scaffoldwalk: Automatically places blocks below your feet.
description.purefps.hack.search: Helps you to find specific blocks by highlighting them in rainbow color.
description.purefps.hack.servercrasher:
Generates an item that can crash 1.15.x servers.
§oCreative mode only.§r
description.purefps.hack.skinderp: Randomly toggles parts of your skin.
description.purefps.hack.snowshoe: Allows you to walk on powder snow.
description.purefps.hack.speedhack:
Allows you to run ~2.5x faster than you would by sprinting and jumping.

§6§lWARNING:§r Patched in NoCheat+ version 3.13.2. Will only bypass older versions of NoCheat+.
Type §l/ncp version§r to check a server's NoCheat+ version.
description.purefps.hack.speednuker: Faster version of Nuker that cannot bypass NoCheat+.
description.purefps.hack.spider: Allows you to climb up walls like a spider.
description.purefps.hack.step: Allows you to step up full blocks.
description.purefps.hack.throw:
Uses an item multiple times. Can be used to throw snowballs and eggs, spawn mobs, place minecarts, etc. in very large quantities.

This can cause a lot of lag and even crash a server.
description.purefps.hack.tillaura:
Automatically turns dirt, grass, etc. into farmland.
Not to be confused with Killaura.
description.purefps.hack.timer: Changes the speed of almost everything.
description.purefps.hack.tired:
Makes you look like Alexander back in April 2015.
Only visible to other players.
description.purefps.hack.toomanyhax:
Blocks any features that you don't want.
Allows you to make sure that you don't accidentally enable the wrong hack and get banned for it.
For those who want to "only hack a little bit".

Use the §6.toomanyhax§r command to choose which features to block.
Type §6.help toomanyhax§r for more info.
description.purefps.hack.tp-aura: Automatically attacks the closest valid entity while teleporting around it.
description.purefps.hack.trajectories: Predicts the flight path of arrows and throwable items.
description.purefps.hack.treebot:
An experimental bot that automatically walks around and chops down trees.
Limited to small trees for now.
description.purefps.hack.triggerbot: Automatically attacks the entity you're looking at.
description.purefps.hack.trollpotion: Generates a potion with many annoying effects on it.
description.purefps.hack.truesight: Allows you to see invisible entities.
description.purefps.hack.tunneller:
Automatically digs a tunnel.

§c§lWARNING:§r Although this bot will try to avoid lava and other dangers, there is no guarantee that it won't die. Only send it out with gear that you don't mind losing.
description.purefps.hack.x-ray: Allows you to see ores through walls.
description.purefps.other_feature.nochat:
Disables the cryptographic signatures that since 1.19 are attached to your chat messages.

§c§lWARNING: §cIf §cyou §csend §cchat §cmessages §cwith §csignatures, §cyour §cMinecraft §caccount §ccan §cget §creported §cand §cglobally §cbanned §cfrom §cmultiplayer!§r

Even if you only say harmless things in chat, your signed messages can be abused to create a fake chat report that gets your account banned unfairly.

If you have to re-enable chat signatures to chat on a server, consider playing on an alt account that you don't mind losing.
description.purefps.setting.generic.atta:
Attack speed in clicks per second.
0 = dynamically adjusts the speed to match your attack cooldown.
description.purefps.setting.generic.paus:
Won't attack while a container screen (chest, hopper, etc.) is open.
Useful for minigame servers that display chest-like menus.
description.purefps.altmanager.premium: This alt has a password and can join all servers.
description.purefps.altmanager.cracked: This alt has no password and will only work on cracked servers.
description.purefps.altmanager.failed: Last time you tried to log in with this alt, it didn't work.
description.purefps.altmanager.checked: The password has worked in the past.
description.purefps.altmanager.unchecked: You have never successfully logged in with this alt.
description.purefps.altmanager.favorite: You have marked this alt as one of your favorites.
description.purefps.altmanager.window_fr: It might look like the game is not responding while that window is open.
gui.wurst.altmanager.folder_error.title: Couldn't create the '.Wurst encryption' folder!
gui.wurst.altmanager.folder_error.messag:
You may have accidentally blocked Wurst from accessing this folder.
AltManager cannot encrypt or decrypt your alt list without it.
You can still use AltManager, but any alts you create now won't be saved.

The full error is as follows:
%s
gui.wurst.altmanager.empty.title: Your alt list is empty.
gui.wurst.altmanager.empty.message: Would you like some random alts to get started?
gui.wurst.nochatreports.unsafe_server.me:
This server requires chat signatures to be enabled, which puts your account at risk of fraudulent chat reports.

You can chat on this server if you un-block chat signatures and then reconnect. If you do, consider playing on an alt account that you don't mind losing.

If this is your server, you can fix this by setting 'enforce-secure-profile' to false in server.properties. In typical Mojang fashion, this setting does the opposite of what it sounds like.
Messages sent on this server may be reported to Big Brother Mojang and might get your account banned globally
gui.wurst.nochatreports.ncr_mod_server.m:
This server uses the "No Chat Reports" mod.

You can join this server if you block chat signatures and disable VanillaSpoof.
description.purefps.nochatreports.messag: This message has a valid signature and is thus vulnerable to fraudulent chat reports.
